nodes.text: The University of Sanbra Guide to Intelligent Life: The Marvel Series

The University of Sanbra Guide to Intelligent Life: The Marvel Series was an article in Star Wars Gamer 1 by Rich Handley and Joe Bongiorno. The article was written in an in-universe style and attributed to Tem Eliss. The article explored several alien species from the Marvel Star Wars comic line.
